renderers

Class ShadowRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • renderers.Renderer
      • renderers.ShadowRenderer

  • public class ShadowRenderer
extends Renderer
    Performs shadow map rendering.

      • release

        public void release()
        Removes the shader program and the FBO from the GPU's memory. After this method call you can't use this Renderer.
        Specified by:
        release in class Renderer

      • isUsable

        public boolean isUsable()
        Description copied from class: Renderer
        Determines wheter this Renderer is usable. If it returns false, you can't use if for anything.
        Specified by:
        isUsable in class Renderer
        Returns:
        true if usable, false otherwise

      • isGeometryRenderer

        public boolean isGeometryRenderer()
        Description copied from class: Renderer
        Determines whether the Renderer is a Geometry Renderer. If it's a Geometry Renderer, most likely it renders a part of the scene. If it's not (called Screen Space Renderer), it not renders any geometry from the scene, it rather performs post processing effects or draw UI elements.
        Specified by:
        isGeometryRenderer in class Renderer
        Returns:
        true if it's a Geometry Renderer, false if it's a Screen Space Renderer
